name: Plan E - Organic Lean Mass Builder

Breakfast.details: Organic Protein-Packed Frittata: 3 organic whole eggs, 3 organic egg whites, 1/2 cup organic spinach, 1/4 cup organic diced bell peppers, 1/4 cup organic feta cheese, 2 slices organic whole grain toast, 1 tbsp organic butter
Breakfast.instructions: Whisk eggs, add vegetables and cheese. Cook in an oven-safe skillet, finish in the oven. Serve with buttered toast.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Protein Smoothie Bowl: 1 scoop organic vanilla protein powder, 1 cup organic frozen mixed berries, 1/2 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1/4 cup organic almond milk, topped with 2 tbsp organic granola, 1 tbsp organic chia seeds
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Blend protein powder, berries, yogurt, and almond milk. Pour into a bowl and top with granola and chia seeds.

Lunch.details: Organic Turkey and Avocado Wrap: 6 oz organic sliced turkey breast, 1 large organic whole wheat wrap, 1/2 organic avocado, 1 cup organic mixed greens, 1/4 cup organic hummus, 1/4 cup organic shredded carrots
Lunch.instructions: Spread hummus on wrap, layer with turkey, avocado, greens, and carrots. Roll up and serve.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Rice Cakes with Nut Butter: 2 organic brown rice cakes, 2 tbsp organic almond butter, 1 organic sliced banana, 1 tsp organic honey
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Spread almond butter on rice cakes, top with banana slices and a drizzle of honey.

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Protein Recovery Shake: 1.5 scoops organic whey protein powder, 1 cup organic coconut water, 1/2 cup organic frozen pineapple, 1/2 cup organic Greek yogurt

Dinner.details: Organic Baked Chicken with Quinoa and Vegetables: 8 oz organic chicken breast, 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1.5 cups organic roasted vegetables (broccoli, cauliflower, carrots), 2 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 tbsp organic herbs de Provence
Dinner.instructions: Season chicken with herbs, bake. Serve with quinoa and roasted vegetables dressed with olive oil.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Cottage Cheese and Fruit: 1 cup organic cottage cheese, 1/2 cup organic mixed berries, 2 tbsp organic pumpkin seeds, 1 tsp organic vanilla extract
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix cottage cheese with vanilla extract, top with berries and pumpkin seeds.
